name: Joey Kramer
description:
Below are some photos, arranged in rough chronological order, of Aerosmith drummer Joey Kramer. Have you noticed anything, other than the steadfast deterioration of a rock legend into an animated corpse? This ain't clean living...





















Yep. Good old Joey (emphasis now on "old") sure loves those crucifixes. How does he reconcile it with his Jewish parents?

We honestly can't tell you...
